tooltip.squake.uncappedBunnyhopEnabled: If enabled, the soft and hard caps will not be applied at all
tooltip.squake.airAccelerate: A higher value means you can turn more sharply in the air without losing speed
tooltip.squake.maxAirAccelerationPerTick: A higher value means faster air acceleration
tooltip.squake.accelerate: A higher value means you accelerate faster on the ground
tooltip.squake.hardCap: See uncappedBunnyhopEnabled; if you ever jump while above the hard cap speed (moveSpeed*hardCapThreshold), your speed is set to the hard cap speed
tooltip.squake.softCap: See uncappedBunnyhopEnabled and softCapDegen; soft cap speed = (moveSpeed*softCapThreshold)
tooltip.squake.softCapDegen: The modifier used to calculate speed lost when jumping above the soft cap
tooltip.squake.sharkingEnabled: If enabled, holding jump while swimming at the surface of water allows you to glide
tooltip.squake.sharkingWaterFriction: Amount of friction while sharking (between 0 and 1). Strongly recommended to be no lower than 0.95.
tooltip.squake.sharkingSurfTension: Amount of downward momentum you retain while entering water, a lower value means that you are able to shark after hitting the water from higher up
tooltip.squake.trimpingEnabled: If enabled, holding sneak while jumping will convert your horizontal speed into vertical speed
tooltip.squake.trimpMult: A lower value means less horizontal speed converted to vertical speed and vice versa
tooltip.squake.increasedFallDistance: Increases the distance needed to fall in order to take fall damage; this is a server-side setting
tooltip.squake.enabled: Turns off/on the quake-style movement for the client (essentially the saved value of the ingame toggle keybind)
tooltip.squake.drawSpeed: Whether or not to draw the speedometer
tooltip.squake.posX: The X position of the speedometer
tooltip.squake.posY: The Y position of the speedometer
tooltip.squake.particleMultiplier: Multiplier to the number of particles spawned
